overview: Kathleen Gerard, a high society wife fed up with her husband's artistic "protegées", decides to take one of her own in Nino, a promising tenor, patronizing him to study in Paris. He and her girlfriend are perfectly happy until the Gerards pay a visit and Mrs. Gerard starts to show too much interest in him.

production_companies.name: Jesse L. Lasky Feature Play Company

tagline: When the world's greatest tenor sings a love song — you get a new screen thrill!
title: Here's to Romance
